    • Field Detail

      • activePhysicsStepModifier

        public PhysicsStepModifier activePhysicsStepModifier

      • dynamicsWorld

        public com.bulletphysics.dynamics.DiscreteDynamicsWorld dynamicsWorld

      • EVERYTHING

        public static final short EVERYTHING
        Collision filter mask/group for EVERYTHING. ~0 (~ is bitwise not, so 0b11111...). Lookup "JBullet collision filtering" to figure out how to use these.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXPOSE_COLLISION_DATA

        public boolean EXPOSE_COLLISION_DATA
        Whether or not to keep track of collision data accessibly thru the collisions and collisionVels lists in RigidBodyEntry's.

      • fixedPhysicsSubstep

        public static float fixedPhysicsSubstep

      • maxPhysicsSubsteps

        public static int maxPhysicsSubsteps

      • NOTHING

        public static final short NOTHING
        Collision filter mask/group for NOTHING. 0. Lookup "JBullet collision filtering" to figure out how to use these.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • rayResultCallback

        public final com.bulletphysics.collision.dispatch.CollisionWorld.RayResultCallback rayResultCallback
        For raycasting with JBullet. results are stored in an internal arraylist that can be fetched with getRayTestResults. Remember to use clearRayTestResults first.
